summary: This document is a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services, authorizing the removal of powers of attorney on her accounts. It indicates a financial transaction or management change regarding her accounts.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the sender of the letter, authorizing changes to her financial accounts.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Scott Stackman is the recipient of the letter from Ghislaine Maxwell, representing UBS Financial Services.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is a client of Scott Stackman, who works at UBS Financial Services.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell sent a letter to Scott Stackman at UBS Financial Services.
Maxwell authorized the removal of powers of attorney on her accounts.
